member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.AnimationTypes
member.summary: Contains the values for the AnimationTypes enumeration that contains various built in animations graphics.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.TitlePlacement
member.summary: Contains the values for the TitlePlacement enumeration that contains various built in title positions.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.TitlePlacement.Top
member.summary: Displays the Title at top of the animation position.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.TitlePlacement.Bottom
member.summary: Displays the Title at Bottom of the animation position.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.TitlePlacement.None
member.summary: Title will not be displayed.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator
member.summary: Represents a control that allows to display a busy activity animation, which indicates the application is busy with an asynchronous operation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.AnimationTypeProperty
member.summary: Identifies AnimationType. It is used to change various types of animation in busy indicator .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.TextColorProperty
member.summary: Identifies the TextColor. It is used to change the text color of both the default text and animation graphics .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.TextSizeProperty
member.summary: Identifies the TextSize. It is used to change the text size of both the default text .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.ViewBoxWidthProperty
member.summary: Identifies ViewBoxWidth. It is used to change the width of the view box .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.ViewBoxHeightProperty
member.summary: Identifies the ViewBoxHeight. It is used to change the height of the view box .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.DurationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the duration of animation. It is used to change the speed of animation to finish a cycle .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.TitleProperty
member.summary: Identifies the title of busy indicator. It is used to customize the title of busy indicator .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.IsBusyProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsBusy property of busy indicator. It is used to determine whether the animation of indiacator to be shown or not .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.EnableAnimationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the EnableAnimation property of busy indicator. It is used to determine whether the graphical path to be animated or frozen .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.TitlePlacementProperty
member.summary: Identifies the poition of title. It is used to set the position of title in busy indicator. .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.FontAttributesProperty
member.summary: Identifies font attribute of the title. It is used to change the font attribute of the title in busy indicator. .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.FontFamilyProperty
member.summary: Identifies the font family of title. It is used to set the font family of the title in busy indicator. .

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Constructor field.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.AnimationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the animation types of busyindicator. It is used to change the various types of animation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.TextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the text color of busy indicator. TextColor is applied to the default text and animation graphics.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.TextSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of TextSize. It is used to change font size of the default text in busy indicator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.ViewBoxWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of view box width. It is used to customize the display width of the graphics drawn.
member.value: The width of the view box.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.ViewBoxHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of view box height. It is used to customize the display height of the graphics drawn.
member.value: The height of the view box.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the Duration property. It used to change the speed of animation to finish a cycle.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the title of the indicator. It is used to customize the title of busy indicator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.IsBusy
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether gets or sets the value of the IsBusy property in busy indicator. It determines whether the animation of indicator to be shown or not.
member.value: true if this instance is busy; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.EnableAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether gets or sets the value of EnableAnimation. It determines whether the graphical path to be animated or frozen.
member.value: true if this instance is Animated or not; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.TitlePlacement
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of TitlePlacement. This property is used to set the position of title in busy indicator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.FontAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of FontAttributes. This property is used to change the font attribute of the title in busy indicator.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfBusyIndicator.XForms.SfBusyIndicator.FontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of FontFamily. This property is used to set the font family of the title in busy indicator.
